677920.name: Acucalypse
677920.description:
Welcome to the Acucalypse!
When humans disappeared, cockroaches take their place!

Build your bunker & planes with remains of human civilization and fill them with bombs to destroy your friend-emies!

Acucalypse is a management & strategy game where you will have to manage your resources in order to destroy the bunkers of your enemies and face their attacks.



DESTROY ALL: In Acucalypse everything is destructible. From the most powerful defense to every chunk of terrain. With this goal in mind, it has been necessary to develop an own version of Unreal Engine 4. More efficient and lighter, so you can see how the roof of your bunker collapses on your cucas!

BUILD: You can build the bunker of your dreams! But remember to have enough cucas working in the various positions, create rest rooms so they can recover from hard work and provide energy to the rooms.

COMBINE: Create airplanes and bombs combining pieces at your pleasure and find the best strategy to defeat your opponent! Will it be with Napalm bombs? Drills maybe? Will you escape from enemy missiles with your banana-plane? Experiment with the possibilities to improve the qualities of your aircraft ... And brutal effects of your bombs!



CAMPAIGN
The campaign mode is a single player against the AI. Through the levels you will receive your military training needed to deal with the threats of the CucaWasteland.

THE LAB
The Free mode where you can unleash your imagination and build the bunker of your dreams. Here you can try all the tools the game has and test your war strategies.

IN THE NEAR FUTURE…
We are working to bring you (asap) new game modes like 1vs1 and multiplayer, where you will taste the full potential of Acucalypse. In addition, we are cooking a Mod manager to transform the bunker and your Cucas in whatever you want.
